animeDescription: Specials of Warau Salesman broadcasted intermittently during the main show not included in the episode count of the main show. They are 3 times the length of a normal episode and fill a half hour time-slot.
animeCharacters: ['Moguro, Fukuzou', 'Mushimi, Chouko', 'Hiyodori, Shinako', 'Mushimi, Ichirou', 'Asobita', 'High School Girl', 'Erito, Tsutomu']
animeVoices: ['Oohira, Tooru', 'Shimazu, Saeko', 'Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Mikimoto, Yuji', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Minaguchi, Yuko', 'Shioya, Yoku']
